ai-patthana8.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_0: Since this is so, you can give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_1: But this quality arises dependent on the thought and the causes and conditions that arise.
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_2: Since they’re not disturbed by poets and irrefling, and don’t arise because of causes.
ai-patthana8.13:2.1_0: Since there is no other thing that gives rise to three things.
ai-patthana8.13:3.1_0: But they can’t keep poet to the debate of the teaching, and the three other phenomena that arise for oneself.
ai-patthana8.13:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana8.13:5.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the partner is finished.
